name: SweaterWeather
0:
”Alexa, ask sweater weather what to wear today”
”Alexa, ask sweater weather about Sunday”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sweater weather
des: Uses weather forecast to make suggestions on how to dress each day. For example, between seasons you may need to dress in layers as it is sometimes cool in the morning but warm later in the day. Takes advantage of "feels like" weather prediction technology which accounts for humidity, wind chill, etc in computing what clothing to suggest.
